titleStmt.title: Extracting Illustrated Pages from Digital Libraries with Python
titleStmt.author: Stephen Krewson

sourceDesc.p: Born digital, in a markdown format. This lesson is original. Available translations are the following:

abstract.p: Machine learning and API extensions by HathiTrust and Internet Archive are making it easier to extract page regions of visual interest from digitized volumes. This lesson shows how to efficiently extract those regions and, in doing so, prompt new, visual research questions.
